articles.title: Apocalyptic video shows what would happen if a needle hit planet Earth at the speed of light - UNILAD
articles.description: Even a small needle could cause serious damage to the Earth if it is moving at the speed of light.
articles.content:
People underestimate just how fast the speed of light truly is.
The speed of light, known by many as the thing that nothing in the universe can outpace, is often used to help explain several phenome… [+2464 chars]

articles.title: Scientists made chilling discovery after finally reaching the bottom of the Red Sea - LADbible
articles.description: It was a chilling discovery made by the scientists who reached the bottom of the Red Sea, and do you really want to know what they found?
articles.content:
Scientists studying the the Red Sea made a chilling discovery when they finally reached the bottom.
Located between Africa and the Arabian Peninsula, because why else would Moses need to cross it to… [+2659 chars]
